candidates.title: Apply (double) delta compression to server responses
Evolvable serialization format
candidates.body:
Begrudgingly move all serialization back to capn'p.

Notes for future reference:
- capnp-rust api is not very ergonomic and introduces dependency on C++ binary (but set up to just be run manually rather than during build so not an issue if you aren't modifying schemas)
- on the other hand, capn'p is well designed, widely used, provides strong forward/backward guarantees, and enables high performance
- all the pure-Rust solutions seem much more immature or don't provide all these features
  - [alkahest](https://github.com/zakarumych/alkahest/tree/99a5b680297bf7eca6591f06a91d15484ecb5316) looks potentially viable but doesn't document forward/backwards compatibility and docs are sparse in general
  - looked at a whole bunch of others (rkyv, fourleaf, postcard, borsch, speedy, ...) but most of them don't support backward/forward compatibility or are unmaintained
  - long list of different frameworks here: https://github.com/djkoloski/rust_serialization_benchmark

candidates.title: Optimize XOR floating point compression
candidates.body:
Now achieves up to 390MiB/s encode, 1050MiB/s decode on random [0, 1] double precision values. Encode up to 415MiB/s for doubles created as [0, 1] single precision values.

Main changes:
- sub out simple `BitWriter`/`BitReader` implementations for https://github.com/icewind1991/bitbuffer, this is where majority of speed gain comes from.
- perform a single 2 bit write for the `10` and `11` control codes rather than two 1 bit writes (~40% speedup)
- when decoding, pre-allocate entire Vec and replace `push` with direct write. (~15% speedup)

candidates.title: Add gorilla compression for network requests
Custom database backend
candidates.body:
Large refactor that replaces RocksDB with a custom storage implementation. Also includes major rework streaming execution and myriads of smaller feature additions, bugfixes, and performance improvements.

Resolves https://github.com/cswinter/LocustDB/issues/93
Resolves https://github.com/cswinter/LocustDB/issues/94
Resolves https://github.com/cswinter/LocustDB/issues/98
